data.title: Mansingh Palace
data.content: A modern hotel, built like a mock fortress, in quiet surroundings northwest of town on the shores of Ana Sagar. The interiors, dominated by white marble, are pleasantly cool. There are 60 centrally air-conditioned and well-appointed rooms. The hotel also has a swimming pool, tennis, golf, water sports, health club, a multi-cuisine restaurant and a bar.
